parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ error: 'unauthorized', status: 401, message: 'Invalid or expired admin token' }) }}

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO backups (filename, file_path, file_size, created_by, status)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.filename }}',
  '{{ $json.file_path }}',
  {{ $json.file_size }},
  CAST('{{ $json.admin_user_id }}' AS UUID),
  'completed'
)
RETURNING id, filename, file_path, file_size, created_at, status;
